children.text:
{{
Table1.selectedRow.hasfixedvalues === true && Table1.selectedRow.hassubcmd === false && Table1.selectedRow.datalength === "01" ? 
( "AA "+Table1.selectedRow.command+" "+InputID.text+" "+ DataLength.text+" "+ Select1.selectedOptionValue+" "+Checksum.text
) : 
Table1.selectedRow.hasfixedvalues === true && Table1.selectedRow.hassubcmd === true && Table1.selectedRow.datalength === "02" ?
(
"AA "+
    Table1.selectedRow.command 
  +" "+  InputID.text 
 +" "+ DataLength.text 
  +" "+  SubCmd.text
    +" "+ Select1.selectedOptionValue 
  +" "+  Checksum.text

) :
Table1.selectedRow.hasfixedvalues === true && Table1.selectedRow.hassubcmd === false && Table1.selectedRow.datalength > "01" ?
(

"AA "+
    Table1.selectedRow.command 
+" "+    InputID.text 
   +" "+ DataLength.text 
 
   +" "+ Select1.selectedOptionValue 
   +" "+ conversions.toHexLenght(DataLength.text) 
 +" "+   Checksum.text   

) :
Table1.selectedRow.hasfixedvalues === false && Table1.selectedRow.hassubcmd === false && Table1.selectedRow.datalength != 'variable' ?
(
"AA "+
    Table1.selectedRow.command 
+" "+    InputID.text 
   +" "+    +" "+ DataLength.text 
 
   +" "+ conversions.toHexLenght(DataLength.text) 
 +" "+   Checksum.text

) :
Table1.selectedRow.hasfixedvalues === false && Table1.selectedRow.hassubcmd === true && Table1.selectedRow.datalength != 'variable' ?
(

"AA "+
    Table1.selectedRow.command 
 +" "+   InputID.text 
   +" "+ DataLength.text 
+" "+    SubCmd.text 
   +" "+ conversions.toHexLenght(DataLength.text) 
 +" "+   Checksum.text


) :
Table1.selectedRow.hasfixedvalues === true && Table1.selectedRow.hassubcmd === true && Table1.selectedRow.datalength > "02" ?
(

"AA "+
    Table1.selectedRow.command 
+" "+    InputID.text 
   +" "+    +" "+ DataLength.text 
+" "+    SubCmd.text 
   +" "+ Select1.selectedOptionValue 
   +" "+ conversions.toHexLenght(DataLength.text) 
+" "+    Checksum.text   

) :

Table1.selectedRow.datalength === "variable" && Table1.selectedRow.hassubcmd === false ? 
( 
"AA "+
    Table1.selectedRow.command 
+" "+    InputID.text 
   +" "+ two.twocharacters( Math.abs(InputYourValue.text.length).toString(16).toUpperCase())
   +" "+ conversions.fullHex(InputYourValue.text) 
+" "+    Checksum.text

) : 
Table1.selectedRow.datalength === "variable" && Table1.selectedRow.hassubcmd === true ? 
( 


"AA "+    Table1.selectedRow.command 
+" "+    InputID.text 
   +" "+ Math.abs(InputYourValue.text.length).toString(16).toUpperCase()
+" "+    SubCmd.text
   +" "+ conversions.fullHex(InputYourValue.text) 
+" "+    Checksum.text

) :
"Error"

}}
Please set the desired Device ID

{{Table1.selectedRow.hasfixedvalues === true && Table1.selectedRow.hassubcmd === false && Table1.selectedRow.datalength === "01" ? 
(parseInt(command.text,16)+
parseInt(InputID.text,16)+
parseInt(DataLength.text,16)+
parseInt(Data1.text,16)) : 
Table1.selectedRow.hasfixedvalues === true && Table1.selectedRow.hassubcmd === true && Table1.selectedRow.datalength === "02" ?
(parseInt(command.text,16)+
parseInt(InputID.text,16)+
parseInt(DataLength.text,16)+
parseInt(SubCmd.text,16)+
parseInt(Data1.text,16)) :
Table1.selectedRow.hasfixedvalues === true && Table1.selectedRow.hassubcmd === false && Table1.selectedRow.datalength > "01" ?
(parseInt(command.text,16)+
parseInt(InputID.text,16)+
parseInt(DataLength.text,16)+
parseInt(Data1.text,16)+
conversions.toHexandSumLenght( DataLength.text)) :
Table1.selectedRow.hasfixedvalues === false && Table1.selectedRow.hassubcmd === false && Table1.selectedRow.datalength != 'variable' ?
(parseInt(command.text,16)+
parseInt(InputID.text,16)+
parseInt(DataLength.text,16)+
conversions.toHexandSumLenght(DataLength.text)) :
Table1.selectedRow.hasfixedvalues === false && Table1.selectedRow.hassubcmd === true && Table1.selectedRow.datalength != 'variable' ?
(parseInt(command.text,16)+
parseInt(InputID.text,16)+
parseInt(DataLength.text,16)+
parseInt(SubCmd.text,16)+
conversions.toHexandSumLenght(DataLength.text)) :
Table1.selectedRow.hasfixedvalues === true && Table1.selectedRow.hassubcmd === true && Table1.selectedRow.datalength > "02" ?
(parseInt(command.text,16)+
parseInt(InputID.text,16)+
parseInt(DataLength.text,16)+
parseInt(SubCmd.text,16)+
parseInt(Data1.text,16)+
conversions.toHexandSumLenght(DataLength.text)) :

Table1.selectedRow.datalength === "variable" && Table1.selectedRow.hassubcmd === false ? 
(   parseInt(command.text,16)+  
    parseInt(InputID.text,16)+
    Math.abs(InputYourValue.text.length)+
    Math.abs(Text11.text)) : 
Table1.selectedRow.datalength === "variable" && Table1.selectedRow.hassubcmd === true ? 
(    parseInt(command.text,16)+  
    parseInt(InputID.text,16)+
    Math.abs(InputYourValue.text.length)+
    Math.abs(Text11.text)+ parseInt(SubCmd.text,16)):"Error"
}}
For Internal use only - no Warranty
